Name: Missing Value Inferrer
Function: Uses statistical or AI logic to intelligently fill missing values.

Name: Data Type Predictor
Function: Uses heuristics/ML to classify correct data types (date, bool, etc.).

Name: Metadata Injector
Function: Adds dataset-level tags like source, owner, last updated.

Name: Unit Converter Assistant
Function: Standardizes measurements (e.g., inches to cm, F to C).

Name: Country/Geo Resolver
Function: Enriches locations with geo data (country code, continent, etc.).

Name: Currency Normalizer
Function: Converts and aligns currency formats and values.

Name: Language Detector
Function: Identifies language of free text columns.

Name: Sentiment Scorer
Function: Adds sentiment tags (positive, neutral, negative) to text fields.

Name: Keyword Extractor
Function: Extracts important keywords from text for tagging or analysis.
